response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional quality and features, it's valued at $15,000 to me. Considering its worth to you at $8,000, I propose a fair deal of $12,000 for the product. This offer allows us both to benefit and ensures a mutually satisfactory transaction. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations.", "product_price": 12000}
